summary: Hello there, welcome to my website!

content:
Hi, I’m Diogo! #From an early age, I developed a fondness for technology and computers that has only deepened over the years, and I can’t recall a time when I didn’t dream of turning this passion into a lifelong career. Steering my academic journey accordingly, I graduated with a master’s degree in Informatics and Computing Engineering (Computer Science) from the¬†Faculty of Engineering of the University of Porto, laying a solid foundation for my professional journey ahead.
I’m currently working as a full stack software engineer at¬†Critical Techworks, where I have the exciting opportunity to develop¬†Cloud Data Hub: BMW Group’s data lake platform.
I am deeply committed to continuous learning and professional growth. Whether by working on a challenging task at my job, exploring new projects, or diving into tech books and courses, I seek to expand my knowledge and stay at the forefront of the industry. I thrive on the excitement of solving complex problems and creating innovative solutions that make a difference.
Here, you’ll find insights into some of my projects and a glimpse into my journey as I evolve as a software engineer. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to connecting with you!
title: About
